After strolling through the La Boqueria Market I decided to sit down at this place b/c of all the enticing displayed seafood and it didn't disappointed.  The pan-fried  whole sea bream fish was perfectly cooked and oh-so-fresh.  The mushrooms were sautéed nicely and had a crunchy flavor.  It was also a great place to people watched while you dine and seeing the locals made their run for fresh meat and produce!
